com.amazon.speech.speechlet.interfaces.audioplayer

Interface AudioPlayer


  • public interface AudioPlayer
    The interface for interacting with the Audio Player on Alexa-enabled devices. The Audio Player allows long form audio, such as music and podcasts, to be played.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpeechletResponse onPlaybackFailed(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackFailedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer failure event.
      SpeechletResponse onPlaybackFinished(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackFinishedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback finished event.
      SpeechletResponse onPlaybackNearlyFinished(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackNearlyFinishedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback nearly finished event.
      SpeechletResponse onPlaybackStarted(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackStartedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback started event.
      SpeechletResponse onPlaybackStopped(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackStoppedRequest> requestEnvelope)
      Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback stopped event.

    • Method Detail

      • onPlaybackFailed

        SpeechletResponse onPlaybackFailed(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackFailedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer failure event. This occurs when an audio item fails to play on device.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the playback failed request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response can only include AudioPlayer directives.

      • onPlaybackFinished

        SpeechletResponse onPlaybackFinished(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackFinishedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback finished event. This occurs when an audio item has finished playing on device.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the playback finished request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response can only include the following AudioPlayer directives: ClearQueueDirective and StopDirective

      • onPlaybackNearlyFinished

        SpeechletResponse onPlaybackNearlyFinished(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackNearlyFinishedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback nearly finished event. This occurs when an audio item has nearly finished playing on device. This is usually an occasion to enqueue the next audio item.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the playback nearly failed request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response can only include AudioPlayer directives.

      • onPlaybackStarted

        SpeechletResponse onPlaybackStarted(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackStartedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback started event. This occurs when an audio item has begun playing on device.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the playback nearly failed request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The response can only include the following AudioPlayer directives: ClearQueueDirective and StopDirective

      • onPlaybackStopped

        SpeechletResponse onPlaybackStopped(SpeechletRequestEnvelope<PlaybackStoppedRequest> requestEnvelope)
        Entry point for handling an AudioPlayer playback stopped event. This occurs when the AudioPlayer has gone from a playing state to a stopped state.
        Parameters:
        requestEnvelope - the request envelope containing the playback nearly failed request to handle
        Returns:
        the response to the request. The contents of the response is currently ignored, but remains here for forward compatibility reasons.
